long_description: Whether you're planning to surf, paddle, swim or play in the waves, the O'Neill Solitude Surf Leggings keep you comfortable in soft, quick-drying fabric. Flatlock seams prevent chafing during activity, and adjustable tie at side waist offers a great fit and a fun look. The O'Neill Surf leggings include reflective logos to increase visibility in dim light.
short_description: Whether you're planning to surf, paddle, swim or play in the waves, the O'Neill Solitude Surf Leggings keep you comfortable in soft, quick-drying fabric.
